content: I'm not sure if there's any place to track point release candidates, but a point-release-worthy bug was discovered in cargo (https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/9300). I don't think it justifies a point release on its own. If other issues warrant a point release, I'd like to include that.
Iff there is a point release, Clippy also would have an ICE fix, that might be worth backporting: clippy#6866

to add to the pile; clippy might also want to backport a fix for https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/issues/6974 as well
discussion(s):
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/issues/6974
https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/257328-clippy/topic/upper_case_acronyms.20FP.20for.20pub.20items.20on.20stable
